results.name: a(2*n) = n, a(2*n+1) = n+2.
comment: Previous name was: Once started, this mixes the natural numbers and the natural numbers shifted by 1.
Smallest number of integer sided squares needed to tile a 2 X n rectangle. a(5) = 4:
link: Index entries for two-way infinite sequences
formula: a(n) = A110570(n,2) for n>1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 28 2005
a(n) = (n+1)-a(n-1) with n>0, a(0)=0. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 18 2010
a(n+1) = (a(0) + a(1) + ... + a(n))/a(n) for n>0. This formula with different initial conditions produces A008619. - _Ivan Neretin_, Apr 25 2016
